channel.title: Help
channel.description: Hey ok, um i need a good client that will be able to run on any server ip, not just 1 specific one. Any help will be much appreciated

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @i_hit_u_i i hit u i
item.description:
@i_hit_u_i wrote:

first of all i have downloaded a client that would only let me use one ip, and it sucked, and i’m using 317[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 10, 2009, 11:09:13 pm[/size][hr]ok well i just really need to figure out how to edit this server, because if i start the server up then start the client for the server up, but i change the ip to log onto my no-ip thing, it will close the client right away, and when i look on my run.bat file from my server it says that i connected from an invalid ip.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 11, 2009, 07:36:41 pm[/size][hr]can anyone help me with this???

Read full topic
